verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name
Blessed be the name
Blessed be the name of the Lord (x2)
Hallelujah, hallelujah
Blessed be the name of the Lord (x2)
Jesus overcame
Jesus overcame
Jesus overcame Satan's power (x2)
Hallelujah, hallelujah
Jesus overcame Satan's power (x2)
Worthy to be praised
Worthy to be praised
Worthy to be praised are you Lord (x2)
Hallelujah, hallelujah
Worthy to be praised are you Lord (x2)
